title: Web app operations
description: Instructions for each type of operation which can be done from the web app.

instructions.name: Add a new order
instructions.description: To ulpoad a BW file, follow these steps.

steps.description: Click the 'Add order' button. You are redirected to the "Add Order" page.
Click the "Choose file" button. A modal window of the browser opens up.
Select your BW.xls file from your computer and click "Open". The modal window of the browser closes.
Click the "Upload" button and wait for the upload to be processed (up to 1 minute). Don't close the window or quit the page while the upload is processing.
When the file is processed, you are automatically redirected on the newly created order.
steps.elements_required_txt: BW file is attached to the order page

steps.description: Click on "Tracking" or "Search" to access the page to which belongs the file you want to download.
steps.elements_required_txt: Page types and their belonging files to download

steps.description: Scroll to the "Documents" section of the page and find the file you want to download. Click on the "Download" button on the same line.
Click on "Tracking" or "Search" to access the page to which belongs the file you want to upload.

steps.description: Scroll to the "Conditions" section of the page and find the file you want to upload. Click on the "update" button on the same line. A "Condition" modal window opens up.

Click the "Upload" button. A message "Please waitâ€¦" is displayed while the upload is processing.
